column1: Little Goat Diner////The Little Piggy Went To China: The biscuit
column4: smoked blueberries all tasted GREAT.  The chili garlic chive sauce is directly out of Girl and the Goat and I didn't care for it. I think Lao Gan Ma is great
column6: Momofuku is great.  This chili sauce is not very good and doesn't really lend itself to tying everything together.  If the sauce were different
